events.message: I received my order last week but want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations and I am not satisfied with the quality.
The customer's request was identified as a refund issue based on the keywords and product dissatisfaction described in their message.
Assigning the case to the refund department representative for further assistance and follow-up with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I am here to help you with your refund request and ensure this is resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and yes, I have not opened the box yet. The product is still sealed and unopened.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label so you can send the product back at no cost.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and helping me with this refund process so smoothly.
The refund case has been processed, and the return label has been sent to your email. Please return the product within 14 days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund for your returned product and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Thanks for following up and providing excellent customer support during this process.
Closing the case as the refund was successfully processed and the customer confirmed receipt and satisfaction.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey to help us continue improving our refund process and customer service.
